author: Staff Reporter
text:
Election officials on Saturday explained the model code of conduct to the City Municipal Corporation’s conservancy workers and asked them to follow it without any violations.

There are over 450 conservancy workers engaged by the Corporation to carry out routine works in the Corporation limits in all the 60 wards.

With model code of conduct in force, officials explained it and asked them to follow.

A pledge was also taken to ensure that there are no violations.
title: Model code of conduct explained to conservancy workers
